entorn.text1: Castellfollit de Riubregós is a medieval village on land borders and crossroads. It lies at the foot of the Castle St. Stephen, recently restored. In the set there are two fortified towers, the circular called 'del Ballester' and one with the plant shaped bow of the boat called 'del Raval'.
entorn.text2: The village has narrow streets with numerous tunnels. The 'Plaça Major', where the church of 'Mare de Déu del Roser', has proch on two sides.
entorn.text3: In the suburbs, ther is the Priory of Santa Maria, where you can enjoy the Romanesque in the area.
